job_description: You will be a member of the above group, which is responsible for:Providing Second Level Support for Hydro One Data Network as well as providing project support for changes and configurations to Hydro One WAN/LAN, Wireless, and VoIP implementation. Your job duties may include:Assist in the monitoring of equipment performance, investigate problems and initiate corrective action; Network change co-ordination, program Cisco routers/switches (independently or under supervision of one of the Professional staff), oversee the installation of them, and once completed test and evaluate their success; Documentation of all changes; Perform other duties as required. This job will provide you with the following professional development:Hands on experience in design, development, implementation and daily operation of multiple networks; Hands on experience in configuration and troubleshooting of Cisco Data/VoIP/Wireless device; Understanding of Change Management Process; Teamwork, Client management skills, and Leadership.
